Package org.hibernate.annotations

Annotation Interface NamedQuery

@Target({TYPE,PACKAGE}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Repeatable(NamedQueries.class) public @interface NamedQuery
Declares a named query written in HQL or JPQL.

Whereas NamedQuery allows settings to be specified using stringly-typed QueryHints, this annotation is typesafe.

Note that the members of this annotation correspond to hints enumerated by AvailableHints.

See Also:
  • Query

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      The name of this query. Must be unique within a persistence unit.

    • query

      String query
      The text of the HQL query.

    • resultClass

      Class<?> resultClass
      Optional query result class that is used by default when creating the query. May be overridden by explicitly passing a class object to EntityManager.createNamedQuery(String, Class).
      See Also:
      • NamedQuery.resultClass()
      Default:
      void.class

    • flush

      QueryFlushMode flush
      Determines whether the session should be flushed before executing the query.
      Since:
      7.0
      See Also:
      • CommonQueryContract.setQueryFlushMode(QueryFlushMode)
      Default:
      DEFAULT

    • flushMode

      @Deprecated(since="7", forRemoval=true) FlushModeType flushMode
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use flush()
      The flush mode for this query.
      See Also:
      • CommonQueryContract.setFlushMode(jakarta.persistence.FlushModeType)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_FLUSH_MODE
      Default:
      PERSISTENCE_CONTEXT

    • cacheable

      boolean cacheable
      Whether the query results are cacheable. Default is false, that is, not cacheable.
      See Also:
      • SelectionQuery.setCacheable(boolean)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_CACHEABLE
      Default:
      false

    • cacheRegion

      String cacheRegion
      If the query results are cacheable, the name of the query cache region.
      See Also:
      • SelectionQuery.setCacheRegion(String)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_CACHE_REGION
      Default:
      ""

    • fetchSize

      int fetchSize
      The number of rows fetched by the JDBC driver per trip.
      See Also:
      • SelectionQuery.setFetchSize(int)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_FETCH_SIZE
      Default:
      -1

    • timeout

      int timeout
      The query timeout in seconds. Default is no timeout.
      See Also:
      • CommonQueryContract.setTimeout(int)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_TIMEOUT
      • SpecHints.HINT_SPEC_QUERY_TIMEOUT
      Default:
      -1

    • comment

      String comment
      A comment added to the generated SQL query. Useful when engaging with DBA.
      See Also:
      • CommonQueryContract.setComment(String)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_COMMENT
      Default:
      ""

    • cacheStoreMode

      CacheStoreMode cacheStoreMode
      The cache storage mode for objects returned by this query.
      See Also:
      • Query.setCacheStoreMode(CacheStoreMode)
      • SpecHints.HINT_SPEC_CACHE_STORE_MODE
      Default:
      USE

    • cacheRetrieveMode

      CacheRetrieveMode cacheRetrieveMode
      The cache retrieval mode for objects returned by this query.
      See Also:
      • Query.setCacheRetrieveMode(CacheRetrieveMode)
      • SpecHints.HINT_SPEC_CACHE_RETRIEVE_MODE
      Default:
      USE

    • cacheMode

      CacheMode cacheMode
      The cache interaction mode for this query.
      See Also:
      • SelectionQuery.setCacheMode(CacheMode)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_CACHE_MODE
      Default:
      NORMAL

    • readOnly

      boolean readOnly
      Whether the results should be loaded in read-only mode. Default is false.
      See Also:
      • SelectionQuery.setReadOnly(boolean)
      • HibernateHints.HINT_READ_ONLY
      Default:
      false
